title: Predictive Maintenance Basics for Distribution Transformers: Data-Driven Decision-Making Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Blended classes combining digital device-based practical exercises and discussion-based learning.

learning_goals: Explain major failure types of distribution transformers and the economic benefits of preventive maintenance
Interpret machine learning classification models that identify high-risk transformers using real-world data
Analyze key variables (load capacity, environmental factors, etc.) to consider when developing predictive maintenance plans
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
